title: Foxy Tales
description: FOXY TALESA Charity Novella for The Fox Project Containing a Collection of Bonus POV Chapters By Caroline Peckham & Susanne ValentiPART ONEZODIAC ACADEMY 2: RUTHLESS FAEDARIUS ALTERNATE POV POWER SHARINGPART TWOZODIAC ACADEMY 2: RUTHLESS FAEORION ALTERNATE POV THE SWIMMING POOLPART THREEZODIAC ACADEMY 3: THE RECKONINGORION ALTERNATE POV SEX ED CLASSPART FOURZODIAC ACADEMY 4: SHADOW PRINCESSDARIUS ALTERNATE POV THE SHIMMERING SPRINGSPART FIVEKINGS OF QUARANTINEBONUS EPILOGUE
